rounds.comments: (Alex: Each correct response will be made up of letters in the word "dictionary" itself.)

clues.text: Farmer Arable dabbed the napkin at his mouth.  Mmm!  That Wilbur...  "Some pig", indeed!

rounds.text: His first name means "moderate"; sadly, immoderate drinking helped kill him in 1881 at age 42, but not on Bald Mountain
